```{r}
cifar10 <- dataset_cifar10()
x_train <- cifar10$train$x
y_train <- cifar10$train$y
x_test <- cifar10$test$x
y_test <- cifar10$test$y

train_samples = zip(x_train, map(int, y_train))
test_samples = zip(x_test, map(int, y_test))
```
